channel.title: Pauls worlds bank pin problem
channel.description: anyone who downloaded the paul worlds client and source knows that every time you open the bank you have to enter a bank pin. no matter what i do i have to use a bank pin even when i first opened my bank it said set up pin. I wanna be able to remove this crap please if you are a pro coder help me on this or skype me :P

item.title: Pauls worlds bank pin problem
item.dc:creator: @jackfrost890 jackfrost890
item.description:
@jackfrost890 wrote:

the bank pin is on its own java file what do you mean by bank pin do u think u can add me on skype

Read full topic

item.title: Pauls worlds bank pin problem
item.dc:creator: @Dan0194 Dan0194
item.description:
@Dan0194 wrote:

jackfrost890:

anyone who downloaded the paul worlds client and source knows that every time you open the bank you have to enter a bank pin. no matter what i do i have to use a bank pin even when i first opened my bank it said set up pin. I wanna be able to remove this crap please if you are a pro coder help me on this or skype me

Just make a variable named and put it in the player class.

and wherever the bank pin opens put this.

if(!bankOpened) { ALL BANK PIN STUFF bankOpened = true; }

Read full topic
